resellerId.title: Resellerid
resellerId.description: Alphanumeric identifier of the reseller that you want to associate with this campaign.

sample1.description: Message sample. Some campaign tiers require 1 or more message samples.

webhookURL.description: Webhook to which campaign status updates are sent.

webhookFailoverURL.description: Webhook failover to which campaign status updates are sent.
